publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-354 Mr Murray Tosh on behalf of the Procedures Committee: First Report of the Procedures Committee—That the Parliament notes the terms of the First Report of the Procedures Committee entitled Draft Standing Orders of The Scottish Parliament (SP Paper 28); approves the draft standing orders set out in annex 4 of the Report and now makes the standing orders of the Parliament in terms of that draft, and agrees that those standing orders shall come into force on 17 December 1999.

S1M-354 Mr Murray Tosh on behalf of the Procedures Committee: First Report of the Procedures Committee—That the Parliament notes the terms of the First Report of the Procedures Committee entitled Draft Standing Orders of The Scottish Parliament (SP Paper 28); approves the draft standing orders set out in annex 4 of the Report and now makes the standing orders of the Parliament in terms of that draft, and agrees that those standing orders shall come into force on 17 December 1999.
S1M-354 First Report of the Procedures Committee (lodged on 2 December 1999) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Bill Aitken*
